column3: A couple of Concept ACKs here, but no other comments for 6 months. Also seems that the 3rd commit is still a no-op (along with probably the second commit?), and #15987 has now been closed. I'm going to suggest re-opening in the [GUI repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui).
I don't know why it would be unwanted.
b1a544be109d336c0b53722e3f8b51687972c94e\n\n@hebasto don't understand what side effect you are talking about nor why you point to that code, `setValidator()` is not called.

aeb18b665c616c3326671b4c7e9d6421306564f0

Maybe drop this and add in the constructor:
```cpp
connect(this, &QValidatedLineEdit::textChanged, this, &QValidatedLineEdit::checkValidity);
```
Then it will run `checkValidity` twice for every keystroke?
